name: instructions
label: Instructions
description: Optional text to display above the activity.

name: startingCode
label: Starting Code
description: The code editor will be initialized with this value.

name: solutionCode
label: Solution Code
description: The code solution. If the output generated by this solution code is the same as the output generated by the student code, the activity will be a success.

name: requireRunBeforeCheck
label: Require the code to be runned before checking solution

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.label: Max height
fields.description: Max height (in pixels) of the editor. Set it to 0 if you don't want to put a max height.

fields.name: lineWrapping
fields.label: Automatic Line Wrapping
fields.description: If a line is too long, display it on multiple line instead of showing an horizontal scrollbar. This does not affect this authoring view.

fields.name: foldGutter
fields.label: Allow to fold block
fields.description: Display an icon at the left allowing to fold some portion of the code. This does not affect this authoring view.

fields.name: tabSize
fields.label: Tab Size
fields.description: Size of tabs on the display page. This does not affect this authoring view.

fields.name: highlightLines
fields.label: Highlight Lines
fields.description: Use this option to highlight some lines of the code. Use syntax 1,3,5-7 to highlight lines 1, 3, and 5 to 7.

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.
